summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4051 for the improvement of Alki Avenue, from 63rd Avenue Southwest to west line of Tract I, Plat of Alki Point, by grading, paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 48945, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
